1.content: Tell us about who you are....
1.title: What to do?

11.content:
You're a man!

Your name is James, and you're about 29 years old.

You have a family, with a wife, a daughter and a son. Your children are on vacation with their grandparents and you and your wife are going to be alone for the next month.

Your work is at an office where you work hard for an average shift most of the time. You like many of your coworkers and dislike fewer.

Sometimes you take night classes at a college to help you with certain work-related tasks.

So, where are you when the humiliation begins?
11.title: I'm a Man!

choices: You have to use the bathroom, and soon!
You accidentally used a plastic pan and its melting on the stove!
111.content:
Today is just your lucky day!

The kids are gone, and you have the day off. You got up at a reasonable hour for once, and now have all day to spend however you like. Today, you've chosen to stay at home and have some fun, and it's just your luck that your wife has also got the day off.

You roll out of bed and head downstairs just a little groggy from the coffee withdrawal since you drink it religiously at work. When you look out the window it's a downpour and the thermometer rings up at a nice 55 degrees Fahrenheit. That made up your mind to stay in for the day wrapped up with your wife.

Once you get the coffee brewing, you start up the stove lighting one of the burners and getting ready to make some pancakes. After only a few minutes you get the feeling that something is wrong, and you stop to think of what it may be.

Then it hits you...
111.title: I'm at home

choices: Go try and explain yourself to your wife
Hide the evidence and hope she didn't notice
Try and blame it on your wife
1111.content:
You look down in shock at your pj's as you finally register the cold clammy feeling against your thighs. after a moment your mind begins to race.

Why didn't I notice this before? Did I really wet the bed?

You frantically shut off the stove and race up to the bedroom, hoping to clean everything up before your wife wakes up, all the while, the pee on your crotch clings to you making it even less comfortable to move. When you get to the bedroom, your wife is missing and you can hear the shower going in the bathroom.

You look over at the bed to see the rumpled covers. Your side of the bed is covered with the sheets and when you lift them you can see the large telltale wet spot of a peed bed. It doesn't look like any of the wetness made it to your wife's side and it was covered when you got up so she may not have noticed.

You think fast. If she didn't see, you don't have much time to cover up your accident, and if she did you don't have much time left to make up an excuse and talk to her about it before she confronts you, as you can hear the shower starting to wind down.

What do you do?
1111.title: My pj's are drenched!

choices: Try and get your wife's attention again
1112.content:
You groan as your bladder and bowels begin to ache, sending a wave of panic down your spine. You haven't gone to the bathroom yet this morning and probably drank too much last night. With that thought, you take off to the bathroom in your room, only to find it occupied by your wife.

You tried the door, only to find it locked tight. "Lillian, can you open the door, sweetie?" You call in, pounding on the door, however, she is unable to hear your pleas through the thick door, the pounding shower, and her shower tunes.

You think hard. The only other bathroom in your somewhat large house that still works at the moment is all the way in the basement, two floors downstairs. You're not sure how long you have left to hold it, but you can hear the shower starting to wind down. If you try to make it downstairs you may not be able to hold it under the bouncing of the stairs.

What do you do?
1112.title: I have to use the bathroom right now!

choices: Tell your wife about the accident
Throw away the pan and lie about how you got the burn
Throw away the pan and hide your burn
1113.content:
"Shit!" You yell at the top of your lungs as you try and pry the pan off the stove.

The burning smell is slowly growing as the plastic is starting to singe along the metal. With another hard tug, the pan comes off with a loud "CHINK" and flies off, grazing your arm on its way off, burning you pretty bad and landing on the floor melted side up. You groan and turn off the stove frantically before putting your arm under a nice stream of cold water.

The emergency passed, adrenaline starts to leave your body and your arm begins to throb and burn worse than most other burns you've had in the past. You feel your cheeks grow red with embarrassment and pain, and you wish you'd have been more thoughtful. You desperately don't want to tell your wife about your blunder, but you also know she's fairly skilled with first aid and probably know how to fix you up best.

With that in your mind you pick up the pan quickly, the lack of cold on your burn sending waves of heat up your arm and you toss it carelessly into the sink to let it cool off with your damaged arm. You can hear your wife beginning to wake up and get ready for the day in the next room and a wave of panic washes over you.

What do you do?
1113.title: I used a plastic pan!

choices: You forgot to change your underwear
You have to use the bathroom, and soon!
You left your important work documents at home!
112.content:
Today was just not your lucky day.

It was Monday and you just had a pretty bad fight with your wife the night before. You didn't get much sleep and had to race out of the house without breakfast or coffee in order to not be late for work. The weather wasn't in your favor either because as soon as you left the house, the rain started up again, drenching you and making driving more difficult. By the time you reached the office your patience and energy was already running low.

You slink quickly to your desk and begin the mundane repetition of writing reports. However soon, you begin to feel off, but you can't figure out why.

Then it hits you...
112.title: I'm at work

choices: Get up and go to the bathroom
Get up and-Wait, too late for that now...
1122.content:
You suddenly felt a little pain in your bladder, making you remember that you hadn't used the bathroom since last night. Your legs fidget a bit and you squirm a little in your seat. If anybody looked at you they could clearly tell what the problem was, which made it all the more embarrassing for you.

The need to pee was bad. VERY bad...if you didn't go soon, you would end up with completely flooded pants...what to do...what to do...
1122.title: The need to pee was rising!

12.content:
You're a woman!

Your name is Savannah, and you're about 29 years old.

You have a family, with a husband, a daughter and a son. Your children are on vacation with their grandparents and you and your husband are going to be alone for the next month.

Your work is at a school where you work as a mathematics teacher for high school and middle school students. You love your job and most of your kids even though they give you a hard time sometimes. There is a group of teachers that get together with you included to play games and have drinks every Saturday evening.

Sometimes you work as a tutor at the local college to make some extra money and get a better list of contacts.

So, where are you when the humiliation begins?
12.title: I'm a woman!

choices: You have to use the bathroom, and soon!
You accidentally used a plastic pan and its melting on the stove!
121.content:
Today is just your lucky day!

The kids are gone, and school is out because of finals week. You got up at a reasonable hour for once, and now have all day to spend however you like. Today, you've chosen to stay at home and have some fun, and it's just your luck that your husband has also got the day off.

You roll out of bed and head downstairs just a little groggy from the coffee withdrawal since you drink it religiously at work. When you look out the window it's a downpour and the thermometer rings up at a nice 55 degrees Fahrenheit. That made up your mind to stay in for the day wrapped up with your hubby.

Once you get the coffee brewing, you start up the stove lighting one of the burners and getting ready to make some pancakes. After only a few minutes you get the feeling that something is wrong, and you stop to think of what it may be.

Then it hits you...
121.title: I'm at home

choices: You forgot to change your underwear
You have to use the bathroom, and soon!
You left some of your worksheets and lesson plans  at home!
122.content:
Today was just not your lucky day.

It was Monday and you just had a pretty bad fight with your husband the night before. You didn't get much sleep and had to race out of the house without breakfast or coffee in order to not be late for work. The weather wasn't in your favor either because as soon as you left the house, the rain started up again, drenching you and making driving more difficult. By the time you reached the school your patience and energy was already running low.

You race to your classroom and begin preparing for your first classes. However soon, you begin to feel off, but you can't figure out why.

Then it hits you...
122.title: I'm at work

13.content:
You're a boy!

Your name is Jay, and you're about 17 years old.

You have a family, with a mom, a dad, and a younger sister. Your parents are on vacation with their friends and you and your sister are going to be alone for the next month.

Your part-time job is at an arcade where you work hard for an average shift most of the time. You like many of your coworkers and dislike fewer. You don't like the loud atmosphere but you get over it pretty quickly.

You are a senior at the local high school and you aren't too popular, though you're on the football team. You're pretty smart and you get mostly A's with a few B's here and there.

You are in charge of your sister who is only 15, but she's stubborn and doesn't like to listen to you. She's always having friends over to play games like truth and dare and spin the bottle. Sometimes she tries to get you to join in.

So, where are you when the humiliation begins?
13.title: I'm a boy!

134.content:
Today was just as boring as the past few days, however now, the weekend had begun.

This also meant that you'd likely be arguing with your sister all evening. You sigh, and resolve to just let your sister do what she wants, maybe that way she'll leave you to your games in peace.

Within an hour or so your sister came to your room as expected and asked to have friends over. You nod and wave her away dismissively which seemed to irritate her, but your answer stifled the angry response she had prepared.

In only a little while, the doorbell was ringing and your basement had about 7 teenage girls giggling and laughing.

You begin to get curious and pause your game, heading downstairs to check on them. When you get downstairs you see them playing a game but you can't really tell what it is. You take a closer look...
134.title: I'm at my  sister's game night

14.content:
You're a girl!

Your name is Lilly, and you're about 15 years old.

You have a family, with a mom, a dad, and an older brother. Your parents are on vacation with their friends and you and your brother are going to be alone for the next month.

Your part-time job is at an arcade where you work hard for an average shift most of the time. You like many of your coworkers and dislike fewer. You don't like the loud atmosphere but you get over it pretty quickly.

You are a sophomore at the local high school and you aren't too popular, though you're the president of the bookclub. You're pretty smart and you get mostly A's with a few B's here and there.

You are being watched by your older brother who is 18, but he's stubborn and doesn't treat you like your age. He's always having friends over to play games and drink. He never allows you to join in.

So, where are you when the humiliation begins?
14.title: I'm a girl!

choices: A character from a show, book movie etc.
15.content:
You're something else?

Well then, what are you?
15.title: I'm something else!

choices: At a sleepover with your friends.
152.content:
You are a 10 year old female child named Ella.

You have light brown hair that you like to tie in a pony tail and dark brown eyes.

You are the only child of your loving parents and are studying in a normal school like everyone else youe age, though you only barely manage to pass the tests, and are often lectured by your parents.

After school you get bored if you don't leave your house to hang out with your friends, even if they don't treat you nicely all the time.

Where does humiliation hit you?
152.title: A female child

choices: You haven't studied at all for this test!
You forgot to wear underwear under your uniform in your rush to school!
You really need to use the bathroom!
1522.content:
You have just arrived to school via your Mom's car. Afterwards you waved her goodbye and got ready for another day of school. Sadly, you overslept this morning, missed you school bus and had to rush to get to school with your Mom's help. Hopefully, you haven't forgotten anything in your rush to get to school in time.

Before you had time to make sure you haven't forgotten anything, the bell rings and you had to get to class.

After you and the other students sat down at their tables and settled in, the teacher arrived and said: "I hope you've all studied for the test roday!"

The realisation suddenly hit you that you forgot there's a test today! But that's not the only thing you've just realized:
1522.title: Forgetful Ella

choices: Get up and get that pen.
Don't risk it, you might manage to get a passing grade without more answers.
15222.content:
As your face was filled with a surprised expression to hear about the test you didn't prepare for, an alarming gust of wind flew by your skirt and the cold it brought with it brought you to another startling realisation: You forgot to wear underwear this morning!

During the hot summer, you enjoy sleeping naked under the light covers.This wasn't ever a problem since your Mom always woke you up and didn't care about seeing you naked. However, because your Mom didn't manage to wake you up soon enough this morning because you stayed up late the night before - you had to hurry to get to school and in your sleepy rush, you forgot to wear a bra and panties under your dark blue skirt and your white shirt with your school emblem on it.

Your realisation came a minute too late as the test papers were already being passed around. You decided to close your legs shut and focus at the more immediate problem, that being the test itself.

As you took a look at the test itself, you found that if you focused and thought hard on some of those questions and then guessed the rest, you might've been able to get a passing grade, which is all you hoped for with your track record.

As you got to the last few questions, you found yourself struggle more than ever, and it was minutes before you had to stop and give out your tests. As you rushed your hands to write your answer, your pen fell out of your hands to the floor in front of you desk.

Considering your underwear predicament, you hoped to avoid any extreme movements. However, you'll need that pen to finish your answers.
What do you do?
15222.title: You forgot to wear underwear under your uniform...

153.title: I'm a character from a show, book movie etc.

1531.content: Are you from any of these?
1531.title: I'm from a Movie, tv show, or anime

153133.title: I'm from something else

1531333.content: Are you from any of these?
1531333.title: I'm from something else

15313333.content: Are you from any of these?
15313333.title: I'm from something else

153133333.content: Are you from any of these?
153133333.title: I'm from something else

154.content: What kind of animal are you?
154.title: I'm an anthropomorph (Furry)

1543.content: What else could you be?
1543.title: Other

info.brief_description: You the reader are humiliated in many ways! 750 GP's for three good entries!
info.description:
Rules
~No killing characters
~No chapters with only one sentence (they will be deleted)
~Leave as many options as possible every time
~Avoid using "Other" as an option unless it can't be avoided
~Options should only be things under the character's control

Anything goes after that



*****If you add three or more GOOD chapters/entries, send me a message and I will give you 750 GP's***
